com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j

Class Wit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.Wit

  • public class Wit
extends Object
    The Wit class should be considered as a starting point of using wit4j library in Java applications. It provides user with a comfortable way to establish connection and communicate continuously with Wit.ai bot. The ways of interaction with user and bot communication may be easily added by extending Interaction and HttpCommunication classes.

    This class has two instance methods for establishing console interaction (interactByConsole method) and custom interaction (interact method).

    Since:
    1.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Liavontsi Brechka
    See Also:
    Interaction, HttpCommunication

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wit

        public Wit(String token,
           Map<String,IAction> actions)
    throws IllegalAccessException
        Creates an instance of Wit class ans saves its token for later use. actions argument is stored in Actions singleton class that represents available actions for a particular application.
        Parameters:
        token - access token for establishing OAuth2 connection
        actions - map (Map<String, IAction>) that contains action name as a String key and action implementation as an IAction instance in order to handle appropriate actions triggered by bot.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - is thrown if attempt was made to assign a new object to Map<String, IAction> actions reference of Actions singleton class more than one time.
        See Also:
        IAction, Actions

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        public static String getToken()
        Token getter method.
        Returns:
        the application's token.

      • interactByConsole

        public void interactByConsole(HttpCommunicationType httpCommunicationType)
                       throws IOException
        Starts interaction with a user through standard console and its streams (System.in, System.out) by creating an instance of Interaction subclasses using InteractionFactory class.
        Parameters:
        httpCommunicationType - enum type of HttpCommunicationType for dynamic instantiation of HttpCommunication subclasses through HttpCommunicationFactory.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        HttpCommunicationType, HttpCommunication, HttpCommunicationFactory, InteractionFactory

      • interact

        public void interact(InputStream input,
                     OutputStream output,
                     HttpCommunicationType httpCommunicationType)
              throws IOException
        Starts interaction with user based on streams provided by creating an instance of Interaction subclasses using InteractionFactory class.
        Parameters:
        input - stream to get data from user.
        output - stream to provide user with data.
        httpCommunicationType - enum type of HttpCommunicationType for dynamic instantiation of HttpCommunication subclasses through HttpCommunicationFactory.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        HttpCommunicationType, HttpCommunication, HttpCommunicationFactory, InteractionFactory
